title: Football Soccer World Cup
fullContent: Home› SoccerFootball Soccer World CupBy OnlineGames.ioMake Game Full ScreenIf you are a fooball fan, you have the chance to join the competitive sports game, Football Soccer World Cup. Choose your favourite country team and play against others from all around the world. Control your team players, take the ball and score as many goals as you can. The energy of the stadium will help you win the champhionship. Make them proud and become the hero of your team.Controls:WASD to move character Space or X to shoot ball E or Z to pass ballThis article was updated on November 10, 20233DArenaBallFreeSimulatorSoccerSportsWorld Cup
